Module flag4j
Package org.flag4j.linalg.ops.dense.real

Class RealDenseVectorOperations

java.lang.Object
org.flag4j.linalg.ops.dense.real.RealDenseVectorOperations
public final class RealDenseVectorOperations extends Object
This class provides low level implementations for several vector operation.

    • dispatchOuter

      public static Matrix dispatchOuter(Vector src1, Vector src2)
      Dispatches an outer product problem to an appropriate implementation based on the size of the vectors involved.
      Parameters:
      src1 - First vector in outer product.
      src2 - Second vector in outer product.
      Returns:
      The outer product of the two vectors src1 and src2.
